Option1: Sum of squared differences from the mean divided by N
Option2: Sum of squared differences from the median divided by N-1
Option3: Sum of squared differences from the mode
Option4: Sum of absolute differences from the mean
CorrectOption: Sum of squared differences from the mean divided by N
